A '''message''' is a string of text written to the [[HUD]] and usually logged in the [[console]] informing the player about events. General settings about messages can be configured in the [[message options]] menu.
Messages include [[obituaries]] and {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage|pickup messages}}, [[key]] needed messages, scripted messages, [[chat]] messages, and others.
[[ACS]] functions that print messages: * [[HudMessage]] * [[HudMessageBold]] * [[Log]] * [[Print]] * [[PrintBold]] [[DECORATE]] functions that print messages: * [[A_Log]] * [[A_Print]] * [[A_PrintBold]] [[Category:Glossary]]
